item.title: Daily Podcast 2026-02-28
item.description: A new transformer-based model is making waves in protein structure prediction by achieving state-of-the-art accuracy without relying on expensive experimental data. | The key innovation here is the model's ability to predict protein folding directly from amino acid sequences alone. | What makes this particularly noteworthy is the practical impact.
item.itunes:author: Eva Dai
item.itunes:summary: A new transformer-based model is making waves in protein structure prediction by achieving state-of-the-art accuracy without relying on expensive experimental data. | The key innovation here is the model's ability to predict protein folding directly from amino acid sequences alone. | What makes this particularly noteworthy is the practical impact.
